# Esimene jaotus

# Nippe

::: tip
This is a tip
:::

::: warning
This is a warning
:::

::: danger
This is a dangerous warning
:::

::: details
This is a details block, which does not work in IE / Edge
:::

Tulemus:

TIP

This is a tip

WARNING

This is a warning

WARNING

This is a dangerous warning

Kui tahad oma pealkirja kasutada:

::: danger TÄHELEPANU!  
Danger zone, do not proceed
:::

Tulemus:

TÄHELEPANU!

Danger zone, do not proceed
